review_data.title: Overpriced but overall good

review_data.title: Best Entrecote in Town
review_data.content: Best Entrecote in Town!!! Hausgemachte Fritten … all what you need…. Super gemütliches Ambiente. Top Service. Merci Ivo!

review_data.title: Not for vegetarians
review_data.content: I went to Schnupf for a dinner with friends. I ordered “goat cheese with seasonal vegetables”, which costed 15 CHF. I got four sticks of beetroot with a few crumbles of goat cheese over it. If you are a vegetarian, go eat somewhere else or...More

review_data.title: Cool with food
review_data.content: Great feel for a night out with basically anyone, we were a couple, there were friends and even a very well behaved little girl. Best steak and chips in town, yes! And a very individual wine list to boot. Exceptional!
